reviewText: A little boring and lacking as far as "how to" YouTube is better at sourcing the trick aspect. The guys in the video are in my eyes better riders that teachers.

I expected more from this DVD. By more I mean more details, more tips, more explanations. I also expected s section on jumps and drops, after all it says "freeride" in the title, but no. It's all Urban riding.
It had been 40 years since my last wheelie, now at 50 I can manual with the best and am working on my abubika (gotta see the video!)
Needing to hone my mountain bike skills, I saw the chance to improve the skills by the techniques taught in this DVD.
